amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 115-679 to ensure that if an individual becomes ineligible to participate in the supplemental nutrition assistance program as a household member due to failure to meet the requirements under subparagraph (B), the remaining household members (including children), shall not become ineligible to apply to participate in the supplemental nutrition assistance program due to such individual's ineligibility.

vote.text: On agreeing to the MacArthur amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. MacArthur.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the MacArthur amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
